mapper.select: SELECT rec_no , dept_code , rec_title , rec_position , rec_content , rec_req , rec_ideal , rec_sdate , rec_edate , rec_exp , rec_treatment , rec_essential , rec_usage , rec_target FROM RECRUITMENT WHERE rec_usage = 'Y' ORDER BY rec_no desc

SELECT r.rec_no AS recNo, d.dept_name AS deptName, r.rec_title AS recTitle, r.rec_position AS recPosition, r.rec_content AS recContent, r.rec_req AS recReq, r.rec_ideal AS recIdeal, TO_CHAR(r.rec_sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS recSdate, TO_CHAR(r.rec_edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS recEdate, r.rec_exp AS recExp, r.rec_treatment AS recTreatment, r.rec_essential AS recEssential, r.rec_usage AS recUsage, r.rec_target AS recTarget FROM RECRUITMENT r JOIN department d ON d.dept_code = r.dept_code WHERE rec_no = #{recNo}
SELECT rec_no as recNo, sort_no as sortNo, sort_content as sortContent FROM REC_SORT WHERE rec_no = #{recNo}
